body:
I was thinking for each thing you could buy perks 

Ex. You get speed two after the walls drop

Or some extra golden apples or other supplies on Nebula .

This was just something I was thinking about tell me what you think

title: [SUG] Perks For Each Game

replies.body: I think we had this before where we could buy things in game using kills. I remember the Spanky Spade... or sumthin

replies.body: That's right and maybe it could blend with walls some how
